RHighlight.p: Asmara was quiet and serene, and as we could glimpse one or two villas through the trees, we felt secluded without being isolated. While there was plenty to occupy a family, we found it delightfully intimate for the two of us, and also loved being able to stroll down to the beach for the golden sunset.

RSurroundArea.p: Villa Asmara is set back just one villa away from the beach. The rugged coastline is pock-marked with massive outcrops of rock sculpted over centuries by the powerful sea – a magnificent sight one can never tire of. The evening we wandered down to Mengening Beach, rollers breaking on the rocks had driven away the fisherman normally out in force. In stark contrast to the raging sea and silhouetted against the sunset sky streaked with oranges, pinks and purples was Pura Gede Luhur Batungaus. This delightful sea temple perched on a spur of rock less than five minutes from the villa is usually a place for introspection, but we were awed to see powerful plumes of foam shooting from the blow-hole within the sacred grounds.

ROverallComments.p:
Villa Asmara is clearly a well-loved home with a lot of heart. We loved its warm energy and felt very comfortable there. We were impressed with the villa manager, Pak Nyoman, who leads the staff of five; his many years’ experience on Caribbean cruise ships is evident in his warm smile, professional manner and intuitive understanding of what makes guests happy. It’s our opinion that the Balinese-influence layout makes this a great villa for multi-generation family gatherings – the billiard table and out-of-the-way media room will appeal to young teens in particular (and these reviewers were not averse to snuggling up in front of satellite TV either). Yet Villa Asmara weaves its magic equally on much smaller groups; and as a couple we didn’t feel we were rattling around but instead enjoyed the air of intimacy that is not always present in villas of a similar size.
Favourite corners? The café table in the billiard room is just the place for early morning rice-view coffee, and curling up with a Kindle in the bedroom window seat made for a cool air-conditioned escape from the midday heat. While it was good to have our own veranda with leather seating overlooking the pool, we were happy to spend time in the breezy open living space, where the large sofas and romantic, heavily carved Chinese bed encouraged indolence. The gentle Balinese staff appears to have worked together for some time and nothing seems to faze them! And the cook showed her versatility by throwing together that breakfast classic, eggs Benedict, as proficiently as Asian favourites like tom yum soup and beef rendang.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: There may be some bedroom envy at Asmara, despite all four rooms being of a similar size: two of the bathrooms are shower only, while the upstairs bathroom has no garden). We only remark on the difference because the single pavilion bedroom has such a spacious bathroom (which is air-conditioned – wow!)

REVIEW.Name: Sharon Tan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had a great time, staff are very pleasant.

REVIEW.Name: sharman moore
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Very well maintained villa in lovely surroundings. The pool was beautifully warm, the rooms very clean and bathrooms well equipped. With regards to the location an easy drive into Semanyak and most other places so not far away from anything. Beautiful staff who looked after us very well.

REVIEW.Name: Miranda Murphy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved staying at the charming Asmara. It was so peaceful and the staff were incredibly friendly, accommodating and helpful. It was excellent value for money and we recommend it to anyone.

REVIEW.Name: Patrick Kevin Hazlett
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
This place was amazing.
Highly recommended!

REVIEW.Name: Horizon Holidays PTE LTD Horizon Holidays PTE LTD
Cass Lloyd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is a lovely villa and my family and I had a wonderful time here. The Villa and the grounds around it are lovely, large and airy. Allowing everyone to be together or have some private space to themselves if desired. The chef, Komma, is a angel in the kitchen and meal times were always a 5 star affair. The villa staff are friendly and polite and nothing is too much trouble. Set away from the hustle and bustle of "busy bali" its in a lovely quiet spot, nothing but the sound of the waves crashing onto shore to be heard. And the world famous sunsets over the ocean of Tannah Lot are yours to view from your own villa. I can highly recommend Villa Asmara for a fabulous vacation.

REVIEW.Name: Sue Fessey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic Villa - we stayed as an extended family group for a special Birthday. It worked really well having the living and outdoor areas shared so we could all gather around. Having separate bungalows for the bedrooms gave everyone their own space and privacy. The pool and gardens are lovely, rooms very clean and comfortable. Staff were very accommodating and were very happy to arrange a special birthday dinner and went to a lot of fuss with decorations etc which was a wonderfull surprise for me. Due to traffic conditions the drive into Seminyak takes at least 40 minutes but if you only want to go in occasionally then it does not present a problem. I would recommend the property without hesitation - suitable for couples or families - and would also love to return for another holiday to Villa Asmara.

REVIEW.Name: Julie Armstrong .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The most wonderful and relaxing holiday, looked after by the excellent and caring staff who could not do enough for us. Highly recommend Villa Asmara and would most definitely book again.

REVIEW.Name: Justin Leong
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A fantastic experience being at Villa Asmara. The service from the staff was unrivaled. Made the stay extremely enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Mehul Desai
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villas Asmara has the charm that we look for when visiting Bali. It does not disappoint with regards to the character and the staff is excellent. It's not as lavish and spread out as some other "event" villas on the beach but it does offer a unique feel that will leave you wanting to come back to it.

REVIEW.Name: Sue McIndoe
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Asmara is the perfect venue for a family or group holiday. The villa facilities are first rate but it is the wonderful staff that make Villa Asmara a perfect holiday destination.

REVIEW.Name: Sally Eddie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful holiday at Villa Asmara. We cant thank the staff enough for their care and attention. I hope we will return some day. THANK YOU!

REVIEW.Name: Suzie Mccrum
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful villa. We had all fantastic time here. The staff have all so kind and friendly. Nothing has ever been too much effort to them. Really nice to see smiling faces all the time. And the food .....Absolutely delicious!! Thank you so much to the magnificent chef - she is amazing We particularly enjoyed the salmon dish as well as prawn curry. Actually enjoyed it all so much that I think we will be rolling home! The house and pool have been superb. We have spent hours enjoying sunshine and water. Another bonus was free wifi although it's not very fast but great to have. Once again thank you to the staff for helping make our holiday a memorable one. We will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Davide Crippa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had great stay with entire family all staff is incredibly friendly and helpful and the cooking is excellent. We had some delays stay here due to volcanic ashes and everybody went out of their way to help us overcoming the difficulties. Thank you for all the wonderful times.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful villa, beautiful surrounding, dinner was great!

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for an unforgettable stay in your wonderful villa. Special thanks to Komang, Ayu, Made and Edi for fulfilling every wish. The food was so outstanding! We will miss the place a lot and we hope to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Oliver Broldiek
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had fabulous nice stay at Villa Asmara. Thanks to all staff filling our wishes. Thanks for your kindness and smiling. We also enjoyed the massages. The food was great. We enjoyed our stay here with the pool and location. We also have to say thank you to our driver who carefully drive us around. Hope to see you all again.

REVIEW.Name: Roger Tubb
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Villa Asmara, the setting and the beautiful well kept villa was everything we could have asked for. Every member of the staff went out of their way to look after and pamper us and this was done in a most delightful way, with no fuss just perfectly calm. The food that Komang prepared for us was also very special and enjoyed by all. Add to this the gentle way of life the Balinese people conduct themselves it was for us a perfect holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Sally Munro
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Ideal villa for a family or small group of friends. Staff welcoming and there to assist. Did not use the car but it looked ready to go.

REVIEW.Name: Lightfoot Travel Pte Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The whole staff get 10 out of 10! Always with the smile, always finding way to make our stay in the villa an excellent experience. I was the only English spoken in the group but there was no communication problems with the staff. Thank you Komang, Ayu, Made Agus, Kadek and last but not least Eddie for making our stay in villa such as a great experience.

REVIEW.Name: WUHU MILLIONAIRE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you from all of us to you and see you next time

REVIEW.Name: WUHU MILLIONAIRE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had a great time at Asmara and also Bali. We like the buildings, the culture too. Villa Asmara has a very good driver and very delicious food - especially the barbecue and the vegetables. We had a really good time - don't want to go back to China!

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for our stay at Villa Asmara. It was a beautiful villa in lovely Canggu.

REVIEW.Name: Addam Mallett
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything you’ve done for us, you made our stay truly enjoyable and memorable. Thank you for staying with us during Nyepi and taking us out to watch parade of the Ogoh Ogoh. Thank you for all the delicious food especially the Sambal. Thank you for the secret recipes. We enjoyed all the meals and will be going home a lot fatter. A special thanks for looking after Lochie.

REVIEW.Name: Indovillas bali Indovillas bali
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay in the villa and recommend all who visit relax and unwind by the pool. The staff are friendly, cheerful and always greet you with a smile. No request big or small goes unfulfilled, every want and need was met. The ambiences create is sublime and we look forward to returning.

REVIEW.Name: Nimarta Khuman
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks guys it was so wonderful, peaceful and beautiful. Thanks again.

REVIEW.Name: Kylie Warfe
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Beautiful food, service was brilliant, always willing to please with smile, treasured memories. We had such a wonderful stay at Villa Asmara, the staff were all very generous and helpful. We would love to return at the same point in the future.

REVIEW.Name: Ming Wan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Made - thank you for all the delicious food again. Thank you so much for all your help. You are always smiling and being one step ahead - getting driver, putting mosquito nets down and many other things. Thank you for making our stay so comfortable! You always making sure everything is an order. We always had water and drinks. Your attention to detail is truly amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Alexander Ryser
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for everything!!! It was wonderful stay with such a friendly and helpful staff with a lovely smile. It was so peaceful and we had an amazing time.

REVIEW.Name: Sophie Amat
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came here to celebrate the birthday of my son with friends. What a wonderful spirit among the staff and how pleasantly and easily they served our needs. Nothing was too difficult. Decorating the house with disco balls, Christmas lights and bunting, cooking delicious gluten free meals ordering birthday cake etc etc. All the rooms were very comfortable and the big pool was so much fun for swimming. We particularly liked the media room and pool table area. It's the perfect place for teenagers to hang out and have a sleepover.

REVIEW.Name: Vitaliy Ezopov
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were visited Bali for the first time. Only villa and staff made our holiday like home away form home. Dear Komang, Ayu, Made and Edi thank you for all what you did for us, we feel that you are all my family. All of you presented us a wonderful holiday. We will miss you and never forget you. We wish you all the best and happiness. From Russia with LOVE.

REVIEW.Name: Karen Nelligan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay at Villa Asmara. We were all looked after by the fantastic staff. We highly recommend the Soto ayam. Chef Komang was also fantastic at accommodating our vegetarian and gluten free requirements. Edi organized a quad bike trip for us which was fantastic and the waterfall trip with Kadek our trusty guide was superb. The villa was cozy with a lovely pool and the pool table was an add bonus. Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Claudy Claire
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all this wonderful time in Bali. Great staff and warm memories from the romance villa. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Really nice village with beautiful beach outside. Staff all are very good and helpful. We will visit Villa Asmara next time. And we will stay longer here. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Catherine Maree Digiorgio Barnes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came to Bali for the wedding of our daughter who was married next door at Villa Semarapura. Villa Asmara was the perfect base camp for us for the wedding. The staff here could not do enough for us and were attentive to our every need. A beautiful place with beautiful people to look after us.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We came here for meeting with all our company member at Villa Maridadi. Villa Asmara is one of the peaceful villa we stayed by far. The staff were attentive, gardens were beautiful and the food was fantastic. Thank you very much for your help during our stay and we will come back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Mathias Brosset
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A very peaceful villa well looked after and a very nice area. It was always enjoyable to spend the day in this wonderful swimming pool. Thanks so much to all the staff who were always available and helpful despite our last minute arrangements. Your smiles reflected perfectly Bali's attitude and it was appreciated by all of us.

REVIEW.Name: Cameron Burry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our week here at Villa Asmara has been a wonderful time for us all. We have loved the peace and serenity of the garden with the sounds of birds song and water and the comfort our rooms and open areas. We will not forget the staff who have cared for us with a great courtesy and beautiful smiles and looked after our every need. They made Katy's birthday celebration one never to be forgotten with charming balloons and scented candles and a fabulous cake! Every meal was a delight... oh those fruit platters and banana pancakes!!! Our drivers ensured that our trips around the island were enjoyable with their excellent skill always calm and capable. Thanks to everyone in Villa Asmara. We will take your beautiful Bali smiles back home with us and try to pass them on.

REVIEW.Name: Troy Robertson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for taking care of us during our stay at Villa Asmara. Special mention to Ayu for your smile everyday. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Angelinie Winarto
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Asmara to attend our family wedding at Villa Semarapura. The staff at Villa Asmara provided us of outstanding service and we will be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Luc Turkenburg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our 4 days at Villa Asmara we won't forget, a beautiful house on a very nice spot. The swimming pool was awesome, wonderful rooms and exotic garden made it complete. The staff knows how to make guest feel good. They are very careful and the service was perfect. The food were delicious and everything was possible. Thank you for the wonderful days.

REVIEW.Name: Glam Tour
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This is our first time in Bali and Villa Asmara was the right choices. the garden was beautiful, the staff were friendly and helpful and we loved the spent whole day at swimming pool. Thank you to Villa Asmara team who make our holiday so special and we love to come back again one day.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the beautiful stay at Villa Asmara. A peaceful quiet location that was perfect for our family after a busy Legian stay. The staff were extremely helpful. Always helping to make our stay more enjoyable. A big thank you for the extra attention when we had a guest over. The decoration and effort was very much appreciated. The meals Komang prepared were so fresh, the staff were always smiling. One day we will be back to beautiful Bali.

REVIEW.Name: The Seven Group (PT Maharta, PT Bukit Buluh)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I was enjoying this stay more than I can express in words, really. The Villa is terrific and the staff was always helpful and accommodating. Thank you so much for keeping this space so beautiful and let us come and have the most wonderful days.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for this wonderful stay at Villa Asmara. The meals were so fresh and delicious. A beautiful villa with a beautiful staff. Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Frances Navarro
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asmara for the wonderful stay, the villa is beautiful, staff were friendly and the food were superb. Thank you and see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Ebony Jones
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all Villa Asmara team, it was a wonderful stay here and we love to come back again one day.

REVIEW.Name: Sven Unterberger
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for teaching us the most important words: Terima kasih. Thank you for your hospitality, support, Balinese way of life, etc

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much Villa Asmara for the amazing stay, we loved the villa, service and also the food see you again next time.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We are here to celebrate our family wedding at Villa Semarapura. It was amazing experience during stay at Villa Asmara. The villa is so peaceful and the service from the staff wasamazing. We hope to came back again and we will recommend Villa Asmara to all our friends in Australia who wants to visit Bali. See you next time.

REVIEW.Name: Bastien Boulay
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We really love our stay at Villa Asmara, the staff was so helpful and really kind. The villa itself is really clean and has everything you need. Our favorite spot was definitely the swimming pool, perfect place for relax and enjoy sunny weather.

REVIEW.Name: Savenio Adelaide
REVIEW.ROverallComments: From the moment we arrived the wonderful team here at Villa Asmara made us feel welcome in every way. Our bellies full every day with each delicious meal plus beautiful surroundings to enjoy them. Our stay here for the past week was been perfect. One day hopefully we can come back. Thank you Villa Asmara we love you.

REVIEW.Name: Kristen Lizzio
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most fantastic stay. The staff made Villa Asmara feel like a home within tropical paradise for my family. I am already planning my next stay and will miss all the friendly faces.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have all had an amazing time in this beautiful villa, we have been very comfortable and relaxed. Thanks to the villa staff who are always attentive and willing to go the extra mile. The food was delicious, thank you Komang. The welcome we received from Made and Ayu set he scene for our stay - it was gracious and hospitable. Many thanks also to any staff we have not mentioned.

REVIEW.Name: Villalet Pty Ltd Villalet Pty Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a fantastic time and looking after us and our friends. We had a wonderful time and will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Christine Indonet Travel, PT
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Asmara is beautiful and the staff are kind and so very helpful. I will recommend this to everyone I know who plans trip to Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Rosemary Saunders
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Many thanks to all the staff at Villa Asmara who made our stay so memorable. Komang is an amazing chef and her food was truly delicious - our favourite was the snapper barbecue which we will definitely be back for. Made and Ayu were also very friendly and very accommodating especially with our limited exposure to the wildlife. We leave well rested and relaxed, thanks to the incredible staff and people at Villa Asmara. Will definitely recommend to family and friends. Terima kasih.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful holiday at Villa Asmara. Complete relaxation - no cooking, cleaning or laundry. I didn't think it was possible to lounge by the pool for hour upon hours, I loved every minute. Thank you for looking after us so well.

REVIEW.Name: Suzanne Fessey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our second visit to beautiful Villa Asmara. Love it here away from busy streets. The beautiful staff always look after us so well and make this feel like heaven. Looking forward to our next visit already.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We really enjoyed our time at Villa Asmara - the staff were fantastic, they accommodated all our needs from food to day trips to the special request of the kids. We had amazing food with our Balinese family and their kids. The staff made traditional Balinese decorations and wore traditional dresses allowing us to experience their traditions. The kids put on show for us and we taught them the chicken dance. We had many laughs with our mixed English and Balinese conversations.

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much. We had a fantastic time at Villa Asmara. The service, smiles and setting were top class. We will definitely be recommending this place and will be back again. Thanks also for going to extra special arrangements on my birthday, it was very sweet and lovely that, you made decorations and delicious cake for us. Thank you for a wonderful stay in your beautiful villa and amazing staff.
